about_the_game:
Cats Together is a platform puzzle co-op game about a cat duo who have moved into an abandoned house and now wander around the neighbourhood, searching for appliances and decorations for their new refuge.

By embarking on an adventure, they will make new friends to invite to their housewarming party once the house gets furnished and cozy.

Just like cats in real life, you can: walk around, sneak into hard-to-reach places, chase the birds with their teasing looks, bond with your mates.

If you want to reach great heights, just use your cat buddy to stand on!

  • Memories for Two: Grab your friends and family members to join you on this local cooperative journey through the fields. 

  • A Wonderful Guide: Beaver is a long-time resident of the neighbourhood, so he’ll be happy to accompany you throughout your adventure and help you out in moments of need.

  • Amicable Creatures: During your adventure you’ll meet many unique characters. Help them out and become friends with them to receive special gifts! 

  • A Variety of Tasks: Seemingly endless meadows quickly morph into a wide arrangement of diverse locations that you’ll pass on your journey. There are five extra levels with special mechanics that will tell more stories about the game’s world.

  • Friendly for Everyone: This game is a good fit for people who don’t play a lot of games, but for gaming experts as well. Lean back and enjoy the content, but turn the heat up with a special Hard Mode if you still want that challenge!

  • Feels Like Home: The serenity of the nature and the brightness of the colors add a calm and colorful atmosphere allowing players to relax completely.

If you are someone who loves to be in control of time and is ready to accept a challenge, prepare for Hard Mode!

Hard Mode brings two new additions to the game:

  • Timer: Just like us, Beaver is pressed for time. Get to the end faster than we the developers did!

  • Magnificent Furniture: Beating each level on time becomes a requirement for receiving best versions of the furniture – something that you don’t have to worry about in base game.

Hard Mode is in active development and will be released soon after the game’s release!

Make sure to follow us on any of our socials to keep up with the latest updates of the game! We are super happy to stay in touch :) Be nice, have fun!

short_description: Cats Together is a co-op puzzle adventure game about a couple of cats who have moved into an abandoned house. Stroll side by side around your new neighbourhood, look for stuff to make your place feel cozy and meet new friends while playing with your loved ones!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Portuguese - Portugal, Japanese, Ukrainian
